sentences.en: All the rooms were comfortably furnished.
sentences.cn: 所有的房间都配置了舒适的家具。

sentences.en: Cayton describes himself as comfortably well-off.
sentences.cn: 凯顿形容自己衣食无忧。

sentences.en: He reclined comfortably on a sofa reading a newspaper.
sentences.cn: 他舒服地斜躺在沙发上看报.

sentences.en: He seated himself comfortably at the foot of the bed.
He settled himself more comfortably in his chair.
sentences.cn: 他使自己在椅子上坐得更舒服些.

sentences.en: He was comfortably seated in a soft reclining chair.
sentences.cn: 他舒舒服服地坐在柔软的躺椅上。

sentences.en: He would be tucked comfortably into bed.
sentences.cn: 会有人给他掖好被子，让他舒舒服服地睡觉。
他那宽松舒适的牛仔裤

sentences.en: My brother is very comfortably off. He has a career in finance.
sentences.cn: 我的哥哥很富有, 他从事金融业.

sentences.en: She earns enough money to live comfortably .
sentences.cn: 她赚的钱足够她过得很舒服。

sentences.en: She is comfortably cocooned in pillows.
Sophia settled into her comfortably contoured seat.
sentences.cn: 索菲娅舒舒服服地坐到了自己流线型的座位上。

sentences.en: Take a comfortably wide stance and flex your knees a little.
sentences.cn: 双腿适度分开站立，双膝稍稍弯曲。

sentences.en: the amount of work you can comfortably deal with
sentences.cn: 你可以轻松应付的工作量

sentences.en: The hotel is modern and comfortably furnished .
sentences.cn: 这家宾馆很现代化，家具很舒适。

sentences.en: The knee's coming on fine, I'm walking comfortably already.
sentences.cn: 膝盖恢复得很好，我现在走路已经不疼了。

sentences.en: Three of the six have comfortably exceeded their normal life expectancy.
sentences.cn: 6人中已经有3人轻松超过了正常的预期寿命。

sentences.en: Wood was now comfortably enfolded in a woolly dressing-gown.
sentences.cn: 伍德正舒服地穿着件羊毛晨衣。

安慰者；圣灵；（美）被子；（英）羊毛围巾

trans.tran_en: in a way that makes you feel physically relaxed, without any pain, or without being too hot, cold etc
